story_teamgalactic_02_11000/2401_1201_02:
Hey, we’re back! Sheesh, that place was
so boring, I don’t think I could stand another
second of it!
story_teamgalactic_02_11000/2401_1201_03: You dare to meddle in my affairs?
story_teamgalactic_02_11000/2401_1201_08: Why doesn’t anyone understand my ideals?
story_teamgalactic_02_11000/2401_1201_10:
That chilling, dark place? How could anyone like
a world so vast yet suffocating?
story_teamgalactic_02_11000/2401_1201_11: I suppose we’ll never see eye to eye.
story_teamgalactic_02_11000/2401_1201_13: Yeah! Dialga’s my precious partner Pokémon!
story_teamgalactic_02_11000/2401_1201_14:
Connections and bonds between hearts end here.
I’ll eliminate them all!
story_teamgalactic_02_11000/2401_1201_15: Why?! How could I lose yet again?!
story_teamgalactic_02_11000/2401_1201_16: Because I can rely on my friend, Dialga!
story_teamgalactic_02_11000/2401_1201_18:
We were able to get out of that nightmare
thanks to the connections that bring us together!
story_teamgalactic_02_11000/2401_1201_19:
There are people who need us...
Who are waiting for us!
story_teamgalactic_02_11000/2401_1201_20:
We can’t stay cooped up and asleep in a
nightmare like that forever!
story_teamgalactic_02_11000/2401_1201_21: I know you feel the same!
story_teamgalactic_02_11000/2401_1201_25:
But that doesn’t give us a reason to leave
your side!
story_teamgalactic_02_11000/2401_1201_27:
For you, we will do anything...even if it means
we’re just pawns or tools for you to use!
story_teamgalactic_02_11000/2401_1201_28:
It’s true that we didn’t understand your
real ambitions.
story_teamgalactic_02_11000/2401_1201_29:
But that’s OK because we trust you! We believe
in you and the new world you strive to create!
story_teamgalactic_02_11000/2401_1201_30: If we lose our feelings...our loyalty to you...
story_teamgalactic_02_11000/2401_1201_31:
then we won’t be able to stay by your side and
help you do that!
story_teamgalactic_02_11000/2401_1201_33:
You’re not wrong when you say human spirit
is incomplete.
story_teamgalactic_02_11000/2401_1201_34:
And yes, being incomplete means we experience
feelings like hurt and pain.
story_teamgalactic_02_11000/2401_1201_35:
But the reason why you feel hurt is because you
have something precious to you.
story_teamgalactic_02_11000/2401_1201_36:
Perhaps even a Pokémon that you’ve forged a
bond with a while back.
story_teamgalactic_02_11000/2401_1201_38:
Connections between hearts... These bonds you
speak of... I admit they can prove to be useful.
story_teamgalactic_02_11000/2401_1201_39:
However, you remain unaware of the tragic
events that unfold because of them.
story_teamgalactic_02_11000/2401_1201_40:
I will find another way—a way in which we can
avoid that suffering.
story_teamgalactic_02_11000/2401_1201_41:
Perhaps completing the human spirit is one way to
accomplish that.
story_teamgalactic_02_11000/2401_1201_42:
With a complete spirit, there would be no tragedy
and no mistakes.
story_teamgalactic_02_11000/2401_1201_47:
As before, you are still nothing more than pawns
and tools to accomplish what I need.
story_teamgalactic_02_11000/2401_1201_48: If you’re fine with that, you may come with me.
